name: Emporio Ivankov
text: Activate: Main Once Per Turn Give up to 3 of your (Revolutionary army) type characters +1000 power until end of turn. Then, put the top card of your life into your hand.

effect.text: Give up to 3 of your (Revolutionary army) type characters +1000 power until end of turn. Then, put the top card of your life into your hand.

meta.notes: Card marked as 'SAMPLE' and 'SPECIAL Q' in the image, but these are not part of the card's official printed data. The actual card ID is OP10-102, rarity is SP, and the counter value is 1000.
